item.title: Getting started with Elasticsearch
item.description: Sample Queries for Elasticsearch Workshop CRUD # insert POST meetup/_doc/ { "name":"Ashish Tiwari" } # insert with id POST meetup/_doc/1 { "name":"Ashish Tiwari" } # read GET meetup/_search # update POST meetup/_doc/1 { "name":"Ashish", "company":"elastic", "address":"Navi Mumbai kharghar", "skills":{ "language":["php","java","node"], "database":["mysql","mongodb"], "search":"elasticsearch" } } # search with query GET meetup/_search { "query": { "match": { "address": "navi" } } } # delete DELETE meetup BULK POST _bulk {"index":{"_index":"meetup"}} {"user_id":1,"first_name":"Yvonne","last_name":"Willmott","email":"ywillmott0@live.com","gender":"Female","street_address":"38 Helena Avenue","ip_address":"104.
item.content:encoded:
Sample Queries for Elasticsearch Workshop

CRUD


# insert

POST meetup/_doc/
{
  "name":"Ashish Tiwari"
}

# insert with id

POST meetup/_doc/1
{
  "name":"Ashish Tiwari"
}

# read

GET meetup/_search

# update

POST meetup/_doc/1
{
  "name":"Ashish",
  "company":"elastic",
  "address":"Navi Mumbai kharghar",
  "skills":{
    "language":["php","java","node"],
    "database":["mysql","mongodb"],
    "search":"elasticsearch"
  }
}

# search with query

GET meetup/_search
{
  "query": {
    "match": {
      "address": "navi"
    }
  }
}

# delete

DELETE meetup

BULK

POST _bulk
{"index":{"_index":"meetup"}}

Upload sample json data from kibana

Download movies.json and insert into elasticsearch by using below command:

Open Kibana -> Menu -> Home -> Upload a file

Create Data view in Kibana

Open Kibana -> Menu -> Stack Management -> Data Views (Kibana)

Create Dashboard

Open Kibana -> Menu -> Analytics -> Dashboard

_analyze

# analyze

GET /_analyze?pretty
{
  "text" : "Quick Brown Foxes!"
}

# hindi analyzer

GET /_analyze?pretty
{
  "analyzer": "hindi", 
  "text" : "चाणक्य ने चंद्रगुप्त और बिंदूसार दोनों के लिए प्रधानमंत्री और राजनयिक सलाहकार के रूप में काम किया।"
}

# marathi analyzer
